problem_text_cn: 如图,P是▱ABCD上一点．已知S~△ABP~=3,S~△PDC~=2,那么平行四边形ABCD的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, P is a point of ▱ABCD. Given that S~△ABP~ = N_0, S~△PDC~ = N_1, then the area of ​​the parallelogram ABCD is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵P是▱ABCD上一点,∴S~△PBC~=\frac{1}{2}S~平行四边形ABCD~,∴S~△ABP~+S~△PDC~═\frac{1}{2}S~平行四边形ABCD~,∵S~△ABP~=3,S~△PDC~=2,∴S~平行四边形ABCD~=(3+2)×2=10,故选:C．
